passages.text:
**space
Stars far ahead are shining bright. @eon_float_eagle
Eon passed by a sun while back, but she can still feel the warmth.
For some reason, it feels nice to float in the void.
[[Eagle|Friend]]
passages.name: Intro

passages.text:
**hi
She spots a familiar face far ahead. @eon_hi_eagle
Eon:<color="blue">"Hey! Hey! Omolon! Is that you?"</color>
There is a wait afterwards. It takes a bit time for the sound waves to travel.
Omolon:<color="black">"Eon! Good to see ya sister! How have you been?"</color>
[[Eagle|Same]]
passages.name: Friend

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon:<color="blue">"Ah, just the usual. Same old things. How about you?"</color>@eon_float_eagle
Silence again.
Omolon:<color="black">"Same! Just traveling here and there. It's been ages right?"</color> 
Eon:<color="blue">"Yes, I know. It sucks to have so little control sometimes."</color>
[[Eagle|News]]
passages.name: Same

passages.text:
**heart
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh yea, that would've been wonderful!"</color> @eon_happy_ox
Eon realizes that the silence inbetween the conversation is getting shorter. Omolon is getting closer to her.
Eon:<color="blue">"Unfortunately it seems like we're going into opposite directions."</color>
[[Ox|Idea]]
passages.name: Wonderful

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon acknowledges that they are lonely beings by existence.
Eon:<color="blue">"Well, you know that is quite unlikely that we both travel to the same direction."</color>
This time, the silence is longer.
Omolon: <color="black">"Yea, we are just slaves of the forces. Dang!"</color>
[[Eagle|Farewell]]
passages.name: Unlikely

passages.text:
**explosion
Eon:<color="blue">"Well, we probably don't have much time. Any news that I should be aware of?"</color> @eon_surprised_eagle
...
Omolon:<color="black">"Oh yea, remember Jepara?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Yes, of course! What about her?"</color>
...
Omolon:<color="black">"Well, she crashed herself into a planet."</color>
[[Eagle|Restarters]]
passages.name: News

passages.text:
**brokenHeart
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh that sucks...You mean, she did that intentionally?"</color> @eon_confused_eagle
...
Omolon:<color="black">"Yes. And no. I think she was influenced by the restarters movement."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"You mean, the folks who believe that there is life after crashing on a planet."</color>
...
Omolon:<color="black">"Yes! I remember her telling me how exhausted she feels because of the constant dragging and floating. I mean, I can't blame her. But I'd say it sounds kind of irrational to believe that she'll start a new life by destroying herself."</color>
[[Eagle|Observing]]
[[Ox|Similar]]
passages.name: Restarters

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon is heartbroken but at the same time she is not really convinced that Jepara made a bad decision. @eon_disagree_eagle
Eon:<color="blue">"I have to say though, we don't really know if she is actually dead though, right? I mean... We can't really get close enough to a planet to observe whether her plan worked or not."</color>
Something hints Eon that Omolon is not happy about where this conversation is headed.
Omolon:<color="black">"So...You're saying they might be right?"</color>
[[Eagle|Proof]]
passages.name: Observing

passages.text:
**questionMark
Omolon:<color="black">"Yea... Hey, just putting it out there but... What if I'd go into that planet's orbit to turn back towards your direction?"</color> @eon_unhappy_ox
It sounds just too risky to Eon.
Eon:<color="blue">"I don't think that's a good idea. You might end up crashing the planet instead."</color>
[[Ox|Nah]]
passages.name: Idea

passages.text:
**dialog
Omolon:<color="black">"Nah, I think I'll be fine. Look at it, it's kinda small anyway. I doubt it'll have powerful gravitational pull.</color> @eon_anxious_ox
Eon feels the stress rising in her body.
Eon:<color="blue">"That's really not necessary. We saw each other, we had a good conversation. I'm sure we'll run into each other soon."</color>
[[Ox|Try]]
passages.name: Nah

passages.text:
**exxMark
Omolon:<color="black">"Stop it! I'll be fine. See you soon!"</color> @eon_panic_ox
As she is getting further and further away, Eon is shouting behind her.
Eon:<color="blue">"Please don't do this! I'm begging you!"</color>
Omolon:<color="black">"Chillax! It's okay."</color>
[[Ox|Omolon]]
passages.name: Try

passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon:<color="blue">"All I am saying is that we don't have any proof pro or against it."</color> @eon_disagree_eagle
There is the awkward silence again. This time it is not the travel distance.
Eon realizes that she made Omolon uncomfrotable.
[[Eagle|Farewell]]
passages.name: Proof

passages.text:
**cry
Eon's heart is crushed by this news. @eon_cry_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"Poor Jepara... I mean, it is just heartbreaking news. But I think I understand how she must have felt... I feel really lonely sometimes. I feel extremely lucky to run into you just now. You keep me company, even if it is for a short time. You know..."</color>
...
Omolon:<color="black">"Likewise girl, likewise! I wish we can travel together for longer."</color>
[[Ox|Wonderful]]
[[Eagle|Unlikely]]
passages.name: Similar

passages.text:
**eyes
@sfx_heartbeat
Eon keeps looking back to see if Omolon is doing okay. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"I hope she knows what she is doing."</color>
As Omolon finally entering the orbit, Eon holds her non-existent breath.
[[Ox|Crash]]
passages.name: Omolon

passages.text:
**explosion
After a little while, Eon sees a little bright dot appearing on the dark gray planet. @eon_panic_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh shit! Oh no...NO!"</color>
A couple moments later, Omolon's unfortunate scream arrives to Eon's ears. @sfx_explosion
[[Ox|Tears]]
[[Lion|Grieving]]
passages.name: Crash

passages.text:
**cry
@sfx_cry
Eon bursts into tears. @eon_cry_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"I told her not to do it! I told her! Why didn't she listen to me? Why?"</color>
It feels so shitty when your friend just dies.
Eon cries for hours, days, or maybe years. Who knows, time works differently in empty space, I guess.
[[Ox|Depression]]
passages.name: Tears

passages.text:
**cry
@sfx_cry
Eon:<color="blue">"Ah! Why didn't she just listened to me? Poor Omolon!"</color> @eon_cry_lion
She feels sad at first.
Then, after some grieving period, she starts to see things differently.
Eon:<color="blue">"I guess, that was her choice after all. There wasn't much I could do..."</color>
[[Lion|Tried]]
passages.name: Grieving

passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon is pulled into depressive thoughts. @eon_depressed_ox
She starts questioning her existence. 
Eon:<color="blue">"Is there any point of me existing and drifting in the space? Where am I even going? What's my destination?"</color>
[[Ox|Pain]]
passages.name: Depression

passages.text:
**hourglass
Jepara's story triggers thoughts in Eon's mind. @eon_think_eagle
She questions the purpose of her existence, her loneliness, drifting forever, and things you'd consider only if you are a meteor.
Eon:<color="blue">"I am only passing time. Counting days. And I don't even know how long the days are."</color>
[[Human|Dreaming]]
[[Eagle|Dwelling]]
passages.name: Questioning

passages.text:
**think
She starts dreaming of planets. What it would be like to exist on a surface. Having more freedom to choose destinations and goals. And maybe she wouldn't be as lonely.@eon_dream_human
Eon:<color="blue">"I wonder is Jepara is still alive? If so, is she still a meteor or something else? Does she have a better life?"</color>
But there is even something more important than that.
Eon:<color="blue">"I wonder if she has company on that planet."</color>
[[Human|Decision]]
passages.name: Dreaming
Dwelling

passages.text:
**bluePlanet
So at some point in time, she finally makes the decision to crash on a planet.
Eon:<color="blue">"If I die, I'll be dying for my dream. And if not, a worthwhile life will be mine."</color>eon_determined_human
After some thinking, she picks a pale blue planet randomly.
[[Human|Falling]]
passages.name: Decision

passages.text:
**falling
@sfx_siren
Eon goes straight into the planet. @eon_falling_human
Her stress level is rising fast. She is scared.
As she gets closer, she starts to question her decision.
Eon imagines the moment of hitting and just disappearing in pain.
Does she want to risk her existence?
As she is questioning further her decision, she gets to the point where beyond that she just can't go back anymore.
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay, this is it. Should I keep going or go back?"</color>
[[Human|Back]]
[[Lion|Brave]]
passages.name: Falling

passages.text:
**brokenHeart
At that moment, it just doesn't make sense anymore. @eon_anxious_human
She pushes herself outside of the path with last bit of her energy.
If she had a heart, it would have beat so fast.
After some shaking and trembling, she is finally back into the soft, endless void.
[[Human|Forever]]
passages.name: Back

passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon:<color="blue">"I put so much thinking into this decision and came all this way. I was unhappy and unsatisfied. There is nothing worthwhile for me to go back. I am quitting my miserable life and I am doing this for myself!"</color> @eon_falling_lion
She passes the check point.
And suddenly she just feels free.
Eon:<color="blue">"Woo Hoo! For better or worse, here I come! Freedom!"</color>
[[Lion|Surface]]
passages.name: Brave

passages.text:
**hi
Omolon:<color="black">"Anyway friend, forces are against us as usual. It was really nice to see you! Take care until next time!"</color> @eon_float_eagle
So she floats away quietly.
[[Eagle|Questioning]]
passages.name: Farewell

passages.text:
**hourglass
Eon keeps traveling in the void for unknown ages, looking for some meaning or a friendly face. Once in a while, she dreams of crushing into the planet and living a different life. @eon_depressed_human
Uncertainty can be very much like to forever, right my friend?
And if you look up on a clear night in the sky, maybe she is still traveling out there, dreaming of making a different decision that day.
passages.name: Forever

passages.text:
**hourglass
That is how she learned about pain, but she didn't know the name then. @eon_depressed_ox
So she drift into the void for ages, and maybe even today.
Time doesn't heal, just makes her numb. Makes her forget.
And she drifts until the day the forces will pull her to the end. Until that day, it's just counting days.
passages.name: Pain

passages.text:
**fire
As she is approaching the surface, her body starts to burn and fall into pieces. @eon_falling_lion
@sfx_burn
She gets smaller and smaller. 
Eon:<color="blue">"I am fine! I never felt so alive before!"</color>
A part of her feels scared as she is getting closer to the surface, but she doesn't regret her decision. Not even a tiny bit.
[[Lion|Hit]]
passages.name: Surface

passages.text:
**explosion
@sfx_heartbeat
Forces of gravity keeps pulling her stronger and stronger. @eon_excited_lion
She is screaming with joy.
Eon:<color="blue">"Life! I am here! Take me in!"</color>
So she finally hits the ground. She feels her body exploding into pieces.
[[Lion|Slow]]
passages.name: Hit

passages.text:
**heart
@sfx_explosion
Eon was not dead. However, life didn't happened as fast as she expected. @eon_lookAround_lion
She remained patient. It started with molecules. Then slowly, she found herself exiting in unicellular organisms. Afterwards more complex ones in time. Reptiles, mammals, plants. And humans finally.
[[Lion|Book]]
passages.name: Slow

passages.text:
~~
**blueFig
@sfx_bite
Today, as Eon lies in her bed, eating a delicious rare blue fig, she is full of existential thoughts. @eon_happy_lion
She is just grateful for her decision back in the day.
She remembers a line she read in a book. 
The beauty of a living thing is not the atoms that go into it, but the way those atoms are put together, she tells herself.
passages.name: Book

passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon:<color="blue">"It is actually really impressive that she put the effort to change her life for better. That is quite inspiring. She died for something that was important to her."</color> @eon_approve_lion
So, the death of Omolon and their last conversation starts to invade Eon's mind more and more.
[[Lion|Unsure]]
passages.name: Tried

passages.text:
**ellipsis
Eon:<color="blue">"Maybe she is not dead. Maybe she just turned into another being. Walking on a planet, enjoying actual company, free of the gravitational prison."</color> @eon_determined_lion
The idea that she is transformed into another form of existence seems more and more possible dream to Eon.
[[Human|Dreaming]]
[[Lion|Risk]]
passages.name: Unsure

passages.text:
**bluePlanet
Eon comes to a point that taking the risk to see it for herself seems more than worth it. @eon_float_lion
In the end, she decided hers is not a life. She is just a lonely meteor, drifting in the void with no purpose. All she does is waiting for something to happen. But she doesn't even know what that would be.
So one day, she finally makes the decision to crash herself into a planet.
She picks a pale blue dot as her target.
[[Lion|Fall]]
passages.name: Risk

passages.text:
**falling
Eon goes straight into the planet. @eon_falling_lion
Her stress level keeps rising. She is really scared.
Eon starts to question her decisio, as she gets closer.
Eon imagines the moment of hitting and just disappearing in pain.
Does she really want to risk her existence?
Finally she gets to the point where beyond that she just can't go back anymore.
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay, this is it. Should I keep going or go back?"</color>
[[Human|Back]]
[[Lion|Brave]]
passages.name: Fall
